name: St Joseph’s Alliance

address.addressLine1: St Joseph’s Roman Catholic Primary School

trainWithUs:
St Joseph's is a National Support School and the Headmistress is a National Leader. The school employs outstanding practitioners with 2 members of the Senior Leadership Team holding the NPQH qualification and now currently undertaking the NPQEL training. 2 other members of the Senior Leadership have attained NPQSL status, 2 middle leaders are studying for NPQML and 3 teachers are studying Catholic Leadership at Masters level.
Pupils consistently achieve outstanding outcomes and the school is recognised nationally as a high achieving provider.
trainWithDisability:
St Joseph's is a fully inclusive employer with an open and transparent recruitment policy.

The school building has a lift to support those with physical disabilities and we will always look at ways to accommodate any other needs of staff, children and visitors.
